title: GPB Capital Sells Cold Storage Fund Assets
sub_head: The firm recently valued the 30-acre Port of Newark site at about $78 million, a person familiar with the matter says
body:
GPB Capital Holdings is selling a 30-acre parcel in New Jersey held by its GPB Cold Storage LP fund and plans to wind down the investment vehicle once the sale closes, according to a person familiar with the matter.
New York-based GPB Capital most recently valued the land at about $78.3 million at the end of last year, a separate person familiar with GPB said. The firm has been trying to sell the Port of Newark site, which includes a former landfill, for years, the people familiar with the matter said.
